messages.subject: re: gear
messages.msgSnippet: I am a little late with this (I ve been out of town for a couple days), but someone requested a site where you can buy homeschool T-shirts... one was already
messages.messageBody:
I am a little late with this (I've been out of town for a couple days), but
someone requested a site where you can buy homeschool T-shirts... one was
already posted (www.jctproducts.com/shirts.htm), but here's another:

www.la-expressions.com/welcome.htm


Also, Pam - thank you! I have been thinking the same thing, about those who
just hit "reply" and you have to scroll down through the entire original
message, or the entire digest version....

Robin
:-)
